clauses.title: Service Scope
clauses.summary: Includes payroll processing, tax filing, and employee record management.

clauses.title: Data Protection
clauses.summary: Provider must comply with GDPR and maintain encryption at rest and in transit.

clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: Contract may be terminated with 45 days prior notice.

insights.message: Pending approval may delay payroll migration timelines.
Data protection obligations unclear on subcontractor access to payroll records.

evidence.snippet: Workday will process payroll, tax filings, and maintain employee data on behalf of ABC Corp.
All personal data shall be encrypted at rest and in transit.
